message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Take it while it's still worth something!
Alice, your offer was a bit too lopsided. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.
Don't be greedy, Bob.  My turn to propose a 55/45 split, but this time in MY favor. This is your last chance to get a decent deal!
